As Amazon refines its network to bring in even more sellers, brands need to find a way to beat their increasingly fierce competition. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, As Amazon refines its network to bring in even more sellers, brands need to find a way to beat their increasingly fierce competition.
In our upcoming webinar, Teikametrics CEO and former Amazon seller, Alasdair McLean-Foreman, and BigCommerce CEO, Brent Bellm, will share leading practices for ecommerce sellers to maximize their brand's potential with Amazon. Webinar: How to Use Amazon to Grow Your Ecommerce Brand <[[http://bit.ly/2aM48TF]]> When: Wednesday, August 24 at 3 PM EST Presenters: BigCommerce CEO, Brent Bellm and Teikametrics CEO, Alasdair McLean-Foreman
Reserve your spot <[[http://bit.ly/2aM48TF]]> Brent and Alasdair will discuss:
- Navigating the evolving Amazon marketplace to stay ahead of the curve - Driving more traffic to your product listings and increasing conversions - Optimizing your Amazon Sponsored Products campaigns for maximum return - Scaling your business without breaking the bank
Click here to reserve your spot today! <[[http://bit.ly/2aM48TF]]> Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
